app_descript:
App Name: Steady

Brief: Steady is an intuitive app designed to assist users in discovering various extra income opportunities tailored to their financial goals, schedules, and skill sets. With Steady, the search for additional earnings is simplified, making it easier for users to keep track of their sources of income and progress towards financial stability and success.

  • ğŸ˜Š Goal-Oriented Motivation: Get inspired and supported by the progress you make amongst a community of like-minded earners.
